goals__remit:
AREAM is a private non-profit making association, recognised as a public utility. The main purposes of AREAM are the promotion of energy efficiency, use of renewable energy resources and protection of the environment, namely by supporting local and regional authorities, energy suppliers and end-users, as well as developing research activities, studies and projects in these areas. 
In the scope of carrying out its objectives, AREAM provides support in the elaboration and implementation of the regional energy and environmental policies, as well as, to the economic agents to promote the use of efficient technologies compatible with sustainable development. AREAM studies, promotes and disseminates measures and technologies suited to the implementation of the energy and environmental policies, mostly regarding the reduction of energy dependence from abroad and protection of the environment. AREAM also carries out projects regarding energy efficiency and the use of renewable energy resources, innovation and inter-regional cooperation, especially with other islands and outermost regions.
relevant_communication:
Main European cooperation projects: 
 
Full name: CIVITAS DESTINATIONS (project number 689031) 
Short name: DESTINATIONS 
Project scope: Integration of mobility strategies for sustainable tourism, through the development of innovative solutions in six islands: Funchal, Madeira (Portugal); Las Palmas de Gran Canaria (Spain); Elba (Italy); Valletta (Malta); Rethymno (Greece); Limassol (Cyprus). 
 
Full name: ISLEPACT - Sustainable Energy Action Plans for Islands 
Short name: ISLEPACT 
Project scope: Develop and implement Pact of Islands initiative, develop island sustainable energy action plans to reduce CO2 emissions by at least 20% until 2020 and identify bankable projects. 
 
Full name: SMILEGOV - Multilevel Governance 
Short name: SMILEGOV 
Project scope: Promote the multilevel governance and cooperation at local, regional and national levels, capacity building and development of bankable projects 
 
SEAFUEL – Sustainable integration of renewable fuels in local transportation (2017-2020) 
 
ARCWIND - Adaptation and implementation of floating wind energy conversion technology for the Atlantic region (2017-2020) 
 
SOCLIMPACT: DownScaling CLImate imPACTs and decarbonisation pathways in EU islands, and enhancing socioeconomic and non-market evaluation of Climate Change for Europe, for 2050 and beyond (2017-2020) 
 
ENERMAC - Renewable Energy and Energy Efficiency for the Sustainable Development of West Africa and the Macaronesian Islands (2017-2019) 
 
ADAPTaRES - Adaptation to climate change in the Macaronesia through the reuse and efficient use of water (2017-2019) 
 
Relevant Publications: 
 
2 Island Sustainable Energy Action Plan for Madeira Island and Porto Santo Island, 2012 (Pact of Islands).
